properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT AN_NO, AN_TITLE, AN_PLACE, AN_DATE, AN_SPECIES, AN_GENDER, AN_WRITEDATE, AN_CONTENT, MEM_NO, REF_TYPE, AN_COUNT FROM ADOPT A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.ADOPT_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY ADOPT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
